data.author: Alexander Liebing

changelog.release_notes: - fixed temporary the limited Memory Problem

- Add Pebble Health support
- now you can show the walked distance of the day in miles and in kilometers
- more battery-safe in all modes
- fixed some minor bugs 

... thanks for all feedback!

- fixed the second-hand-bug ... thanks for all feedback and help!
- more battery-safe in all modes
- you can disable the markers
- you can disable the date
- i added the date-language Irish

- fixed some bugs
- more battery-safe
- you can config to see 12 / 3,6,9,12 or all numbers on wachface
- you can change the digital-time-format to 12H / 24H - i added the date-language Italian

- now you can show the Time as digital Numbers too
- you can change the colors of Date and Digital-Time

- fix a problem wirth the time-notification vibration
- optimize sthe stroke width of minute and hourhand
- update, fix a problem with the time-notification-vibration

- i've added the date-language Spain
- you can get a vibration if the bluetooth connection lost
- you can configure a vibration on every hour, half hour or 15 Minutes
now you can change the date-language to english, french or german

- now you can change the color of the Numbers
- second-hand color can set to similar color of the numbers
Now you can change the stroke of the Minute-Hand

Big update to v2.0 :)

Configuration-Page, now you can change:

- Marker Color
- Second-Hand Mode (hide, run, etc.)
- Second-Hand Color
- Hour-/Minute-Hand Color

Battery-indicater is now animate for charging

- battery indicator fixed
- minute hand is mutch more present (1 pixel bigger)

data.description:
TimeFace One is a configurable antialasing watchface for your pebble time including Pebble Health.

UPDATE to New Version v3.0  Enjoy it :-)
 
Thx for your Help and Feedback ... so i could fixed some bugs :-)

- SDK 4 ready

You can show the walked distance of the day in miles and in kilometers, so please enable/disable Pebble Health in our Configuration-Panel (last point) and have fun :-)
- more Power-Save in all Modes

Features:

- Configuration Panel
- shows the walked distance of the day in miles and in kilometers
- manage secound-hand-mode for saving battery life:
- hide secound-hand
- indicator for battery status
- indicator and vibration for bluetooth status
- language support: english / french / german / spanish / italian / irish
- shows Digital-Time in 12 / 24 hours
- shows Month and Day of the Year
- vibration every hour / half hour or fifteen minutes
- choose color of Markers, Numbers, Hands, Day and Month and Digital-Time
- choose Number-Mode to see only the 12 or 3,6,9,12 or all Numbers

If you see a bug or if you have an idea to make the watchface  better then feel free to contact me ...

...and please don't forget to tap the heart if you like :)
data.title: TimeFace One (Analog)
